com.scriptedmc.script.client.gui

Class Anchor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scriptedmc.script.client.gui.Anchor

  • @SideOnly(value=CLIENT)
public class Anchor
extends java.lang.Object
    Component anchor. Use it to set component position You can use bitwise OR. Example: 
    MIDDLE | CENTER
    will be position at the center of your screen
